title: Alex Evenings Women's 3/4 Sleeve Stretch Lace Bodice One Piece Mother of The Bride Dress (Petite and Regular Sizes)
description: Elegant Lace Design: Luxurious stretch sequin lace bodice adorned with intricate detailing, providing a stunning Mother of the Bride look. The shimmering sequins catch the light, ensuring you sparkle at your special event.

Versatile Style: Long mock dress featuring 3/4 sleeves for modest coverage and a gracefully flowing chiffon skirt. This one-piece dress transitions seamlessly from day to evening events, suitable for various occasions.
Easy Wear Design: The concealed center back zipper offers easy dressing and a smooth silhouette, making this Alex Evenings gown a go-to choice for mothers of the bride seeking both style and comfort.
Bra-Friendly Design: Stay comfortable and confident all night long with the bra-friendly design of this formal long length dress, allowing you to enjoy the festivities without compromise.

Sizes for Every Woman: At Alex Evenings, we embrace the beauty of every woman. Our inclusive sizing, from Petite to Regular, and Plus sizes, ensures that our dresses are designed to complement various body types.

Make a lasting impression at your next formal event with the Alex Evenings Women's Mother of the Bride Dress. This sophisticated one-piece gown features a stretch lace bodice adorned with delicate sequins, providing both comfort and a touch of glamour. The 3/4 sleeves offer modest coverage, while the long, flowing chiffon skirt creates a graceful silhouette. Available in petite and regular sizes, this dress ensures a perfect fit for all body types. The concealed center back zipper allows for easy dressing and a smooth appearance.
